content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was about the rental price for a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. The landlord, Peter Schmidt, started with an offer of 1500 euros per month, which was higher than what I was willing to pay as a student. I was looking for a price that reflected the value of the apartment while also being within my budget. Due to the landlord's stance on not lowering the price and my unwillingness to pay more than what I considered fair, we did not reach an agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as a 1.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, I felt discriminated or offended at a certain point during the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: During the negotiation, I felt discriminated or offended because the landlord, Peter Schmidt, made it clear that he was not bound by any moral or ethical standards and was willing to be very greedy and petty. His attitude towards the negotiation, especially his refusal to consider my budget as a student, made me feel that he was not treating me fairly or with respect.
name: Haoyu Wang
